itunes:title: Ephesians Week 1 with Jennie Allen
title: Ephesians Week 1 with Jennie Allen
description:
For the first week of our Ephesians series, Raechel and Amanda talk with bestselling author and IF: Gathering visionary, Jennie Allen. While discussing adjectives, altar calls, and the apostle Paul’s affinity for run-on sentences, the women navigate nuanced theology and how to embrace the tension we find in Scripture. Together, they glory in the unity and steadfast hope that is ours in Christ when we seek the true prize of knowing Jesus.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Ephesians reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Ephesians Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15.

Survey:

We’d love to get to know you more and hear about your listening experience! Visit SheReadsTruth.com/Survey to share podcast feedback with our team. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/ephesians-week-1-with-jennie-allen/
